html: Isaiah 59:4. None calleth for justice—None seek to redress these wrongs and violences; they commit all rapines and frauds with impunity;they trust in vanity—In vain and empty words, void of all consistency; or, in vain things, such as their idols were, often called vanity and nothing, 1 Corinthians 8:4; or in their own power, craft, and policy, whereby, laying aside justice, they oppressed others. And speak lies—This may refer to the judges, lawyers, and false prophets, who told them they should not go into captivity; as if he had said, They speak that which they know to be false. They conceive mischief and bring forth, &c.—These two words, conceiving andbringing forth, denote the whole contriving and perfecting of their wickedness.
